title: ECPPotential
description:
Information for a single ECP potential.


Parameters
----------
ecp_type : {scalar,spinorbit}

        The type of the ECP potential.
    
angular_momentum : List[int]
    Angular momentum for the ECPs.
r_exponents : List[int]
    Exponents of the 'r' term.
gaussian_exponents : List[float]
    Exponents of the 'gaussian' term.
coefficients : List[List[float]]
    General contraction coefficients for this shell, individual list components will be the individual segment contraction coefficients.

ecp_type.title: Ecp Type
ecp_type.description: The type of the ECP potential.

coefficients.title: Coefficients
coefficients.description: General contraction coefficients for this shell, individual list components will be the individual segment contraction coefficients.
